```{r setup}
# but for now you can do
devtools::install_github("cmilando/getANCHOR")
library(getANCHOR)
```

In order for the functions to work, you will need to know where to point it. 
For this, you have to use the ANCHOR config file. When you get the file location,
use the following command to access. This only has to be done once. 

```{r config}
CONFIG_FNAME = "*****/*****/*****/*****.RDS"
set_config(CONFIG_FNAME)
```
